function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in credit guarantee ratio during the emergency stage of COVID-19","Impact":"Potential increase in financial transactions and interactions, leading to higher risk of disease transmission in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and distancing measures in financial institutions, monitor and control crowd density","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, remote transaction technologies","People":"Customers, employees, and stakeholders in financial institutions","Owner":"Financial institutions and government authorities"},{"Description":"Establishment of regional credit guarantee scheme in ASEAN","Impact":"Increased cross-border financial transactions and interactions, potentially leading to higher risk of disease transmission between countries","Mitigation":"Enforce health and safety guidelines for cross-border transactions, promote remote and digital financial interactions","Technologies":"Blockchain for secure and traceable transactions, digital identity verification systems","People":"Cross-border traders, financial institutions, and policymakers","Owner":"ASEAN authorities and regional financial institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration of social risk in policy development","Impact":"Inadequate policies that do not account for social risk may lead to ineffective disease mitigation measures and interventions","Mitigation":"Incorporate social risk assessment into policy development, engage with local communities and stakeholders for feedback and insight","Technologies":"Data analytics for social risk assessment, community engagement platforms for feedback collection","People":"Public institutions, policymakers, and local communities","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, and public institutions"}]}
